subcategories.title: API Documentation

snippets.name: zod-swagger
snippets.purpose: The ultimate 'low-pain' documentation helper. Define your routes and Zod schemas programmatically, and documentation is generated automatically.

snippets.name: swagger
snippets.description: API documentation using JSDoc and Swagger UI
